channel.title: [CoD4] Favorite classes
channel.description:
Well i thought this may help each other to try out different combinations, who knows someone else's classes may give us new ideas for our own classes.
Heres mine:
[b][u]Sniper[/u][/b] [list] [b]Weapons[/b]
[ul][li].50 cal [/li] [li]MP44[/li][/ul]
[b]Perks & Inventory[/b]
[ul][li]Overkill - Carry two primary weapons, no pistol. [/li] [li]Claymore x 2 - Trip activated explosive mine.[/li] [li]Iron lungs - Longer breath for steadier sniper shots.[/li] [li]Frag/Stun x 1[/li][/ul]
[b][u]General[/u][/b] [i]For maps that have good hiding spots, and places where people regularly sniper from - usually use this for Team hardcore matches[/i]
[ul] [b]Weapons[/b] [list][li]MP44[/li] [li].50 cal[/li][/list] [b]Perks & Inventory[/b] [list][li]Overkill - Carry two primary weapons, no pistol. [/li] [li]Claymore x 2 - Trip activated explosive mine.[/li] [li]Deep impact[/li] [li]Frag/Stun x 1[/li] [/list]
[b][u]Fast paced[/u][/b] [i]For fast paced games like Team deathmatch, Free for all, Headquarters and Domination with small maps.[/i] [list] [b]Weapons[/b] [list][li]MP44[/li] [li] Gold Desert Eagle[/li][/list] [b]Perks & Inventory[/b] [list][li]Double tap - Increased rate of fire.[/li] [li]Claymore x 2 - Trip activated explosive mine.[/li] [li]Deep impact/li] [list][li]Frag/Stun x 1[/li] [/list]
Since i normally play hardcore matches i use the MP44 (Unlocked at rank 52) since its a one shot kill, and probably the most accurate gun on the game. Current rank: 55 prestige mode
I'm not going to go into the next prestige mode for a while, not untill i get bored anyway.[/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: [CoD4] Favorite classes
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well I am trying to do lots of challenges so I can get a 55 quickly on this account and leave it like that,so I can just play on it with all the weapons whenever.

My favorite is the first assault rifle,M16A4 with red dot

Perks:Bandolier,Stopping power,Martydom.

Read full topic

item.title: [CoD4] Favorite classes
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Occasionally I’ll use different stuff If I’m wanting to try something new, or complete challenges.

I use the M16A4 Assault rifle, with a red dot sight. I usually use the desert camo, but thats just until I can get red tiger. For a sidearm, I use a desert eagle. For a special grenade, I use the stun grenade. My 3 perks are: RPG-7, stopping power, and last stand(my fav).

I named my gun Nig

Read full topic

item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

m16
red dot

claymore

deep impact

that is what i use in general. I snipe using the same thing as you.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

I like the M21 sniper, and a USP

Stopping power and deep impact and More ammo for my perks. I like to have this combo on any map or mode.
I play PS3 online.

item.title: [CoD4] Favorite classes
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

the barret isnt that good, yea it kills pretty much one hit kill, but your better off with an m40 (most accurate sniper) with stopping power making it about the same damage as the barret… i like to use m4 silenced and p90 with red dot scope

item.title: [CoD4] Favorite classes
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Well i thought this may help each other to try out different combinations, who knows someone else’s classes may give us new ideas for our own classes.

Heres mine:

Sniper
[list]
Weapons

[ul][li].50 cal [/li]
[li]MP44[/li][/ul]

Perks & Inventory

[ul][li]Overkill - Carry two primary weapons, no pistol. [/li]
[li]Claymore x 2 - Trip activated explosive mine.[/li]
[li]Iron lungs - Longer breath for steadier sniper shots.[/li]
[li]Frag/Stun x 1[/li][/ul]

General
For maps that have good hiding spots, and places where people regularly sniper from - usually use this for Team hardcore matches

[ul] Weapons
[list][li]MP44[/li]
[li].50 cal[/li][/list]
Perks & Inventory
[list][li]Overkill - Carry two primary weapons, no pistol. [/li]
[li]Claymore x 2 - Trip activated explosive mine.[/li]
[li]Deep impact[/li]
[li]Frag/Stun x 1[/li]
[/list]

Fast paced
For fast paced games like Team deathmatch, Free for all, Headquarters and Domination with small maps.
[list]
Weapons
[list][li]MP44[/li]
[li] Gold Desert Eagle[/li][/list]
Perks & Inventory
[list][li]Double tap - Increased rate of fire.[/li]
[li]Claymore x 2 - Trip activated explosive mine.[/li]
[li]Deep impact/li]
[list][li]Frag/Stun x 1[/li]
[/list]

Since i normally play hardcore matches i use the MP44 (Unlocked at rank 52) since its a one shot kill, and probably the most accurate gun on the game.
Current rank: 55 prestige mode

I’m not going to go into the next prestige mode for a while, not untill i get bored anyway.[/list][/list][/ul]

Read full topic
